name: Software
description: Software development - this group is about creating new solutions with wide knowledge about programming and new technologies.

name: IT Infrastructure
description: IT Infrastructure - people here take care of maintanance, projecting or implementating the organisation's systems or resources.

name: Design
description: Design - designers not only care about the visual aspects of products, but are also responsible for designing the outline of the product and taking care of user's feelings

name: Data
description: Data - people here take care of data, build solutions to store them or analyze them to support business decisions.

name: Cybersecurity
description: Cybersecurity - people here protect company's assets from threats and unathorized acesses.

name: Management
description: Management - planning, decision making and leading a team are the main duties in this group.

name: Testing
description: Testing - in this group, with the help of techniques and hard skills, people ensure the highest quality of the product and protect it against bugs and incovinice that customers may experience.
